const GReal_t GReal_EPSILON
 Smallest real number for which 1+epsilon != 1.

Detailed Description

Basic classes and data types.

Factory for Higgs field over a general relativistic spacetime (multipole expansion is used).

Factory for KG field over Kerr spacetime (multipole expansion is used).

Version:
0.5, 07/15/2008
Since:
GridRipper 0.5, 03/30/2007
Author:
Andras Laszlo

Typedef Documentation

typedef double gridripper::GReal_t

Real number type.

It can be float, double or long double.

const GReal_t gridripper::GReal_EPSILON

Initial value:

 sizeof(GReal_t) == 4? FLT_EPSILON :
                              sizeof(GReal_t) == 8? DBL_EPSILON :
                                                    LDBL_EPSILON
